entry.title: At Last I’ve Made Myself a Website

link.title: At Last I've Made Myself a Website

entry.content:
I’ve been developing software profesionally for neraly a year and programming for six. I figured it was time to finally make myself a website where I can share my musings about the things a I love.

-Phillip
entry.summary: I’ve been developing software profesionally for neraly a year and programming for six. I figured it was time to finally make myself a website where I can share my musings about the things a I love.
